summary: Islamic app featuring Quran text, Muslim festival dates, and azan (prayer times)
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Islamic geometric pattern background with gold and emerald tones, subtle and elegant (islamic-pattern-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Crescent moon and star icon in gold color for app branding (crescent-icon.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Display Quran text with surah (chapter) navigation, allowing users to browse and read all 114 surahs with Arabic text and translations
Show a calendar of major Muslim festival dates including Eid al-Fitr, Eid al-Adha, Ramadan start and end dates, and other significant Islamic holidays with Hijri calendar dates
Provide daily prayer times (azan) for the five obligatory prayers (Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha) based on user location or selected city

Design a cohesive visual theme with Islamic-inspired aesthetics using elegant geometric patterns, calligraphic elements, and a warm color palette (gold, emerald green, deep teal) that creates a reverent and peaceful atmosphere throughout the application
